name: agnosticui
description: Component primitives first coded in semantic HTML and CSS, then copied over to React, Vue, Angular, and Svelte implementations. CSS properties themable.

scripts.sync: yarn stylelint && yarn build:css && yarn sync:react && yarn sync:angular && yarn sync:vue && yarn sync:svelte
scripts.lint: yarn lint:react && yarn lint:angular && yarn lint:svelte && yarn lint:vue && yarn stylelint
scripts.test: yarn sync:react && yarn test:react && yarn sync:vue && yarn sync:svelte && yarn test:svelte
scripts.start:css: yarn stylelint && yarn build:css && yarn workspace agnostic-css run start
scripts.build:css: yarn stylelint && yarn workspace agnostic-css run build
scripts.start:angular: yarn build:css && yarn workspace agnostic-angular run storybook
scripts.start:react: yarn build:css && yarn workspace agnostic-react run storybook
scripts.start:vue: yarn build:css && yarn workspace agnostic-vue run storybook
scripts.start:svelte: yarn build:css && yarn workspace agnostic-svelte run storybook
